text: Adélaïde Charlier (born ) is a climate activist, and one of the leaders of the School strike for climate. She co-edited a statement for the Guardian. She was named an Ambassador of Conscience by Amnesty International. ==Life== She is studying at Collège Notre-Dame de la Paix in Namur. In 2019, with Anuna De Wever, she co-created the Belgian ‘Youth for Climate’ movement. She organized climate marches in Belgium. ==References== Category:Climate activists Category:Living people Category:Year of birth uncertain Category:2000s births
title: Adélaïde Charlier
